alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Grundy; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:44PM CST until December 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Eastern Tama County in central Iowa... Bremer County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Grundy County in central Iowa... Eastern Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 743 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shell Rock to near Belle Plaine, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Waverly around 750 PM CST. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 73. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across northeast Iowa. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for central, north central and northeastern Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Grundy; Tama
